description: Azara microphylla is a truly amazing plant species! Not only does it produce attractive yellow flowers with a pleasant fragrance, but its leaves also have an enticing smell when crushed. Its small size and evergreen nature make it an excellent choice for gardens, as its dense branches provide cover and habitat for wildlife. Additionally, these low-maintenance plants can survive in a variety of climates and soils, so they can be enjoyed almost anywhere! Azara microphylla is an amazing species that offers beauty and low-maintenance care all year round.
